title: Puzzle Games - Sound Effects
description: Take yout Puzzle Game to another level! :D
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


By investing in this pack you automatically get over 100 designed sounds for your puzzle game, these sounds were thought with reference to tile-based games.


In these games the actions are basically moving the pieces and scoring points before a certain time, or something happens, thinking about that I made a variation of sounds for each of all the actions that I managed to gather playing this style of game.


Sounds like "Score" and "Victory" are very happy, so you can also use it for other things, like leveling up, opening a chest, receiving a reward, among many others, so I believe this pack is a great purchase your gallery!


It's worth remembering that investing in the package, in addition to taking all this, also helps me a lot to continue creating quality sound effects at a very nice price! :D

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the images are distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay and unsplash.
